name: VirusWar
description:
We present you the game "Virus War"! 

This is an exciting, dynamic game about fighting for healthy cells and dominance on the battlefield. Each player can attack healthy cells by spending their DNA, thereby spreading their influence and increasing their power. Players can attack both "empty" healthy cells and rivals, turning their DNA into their own and gaining dominance on the map. 

me vs bot

The player will have to fight against cunning virus bots that will try to capture everything around with all their might. For a variety of strategies, you can change your characteristics: Infectability, Survivability, Speed. Combine skill points and achieve an optimal distribution strategy. Victory is ensured by the complete capture of the map, turning opponents into our virus and capturing all healthy cells.
